register-description: Join Shark and start managing your account in a few seconds.
phone-number-placeholder: Your phone number with country code no.
nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters long
phoneMin: Phone number must be at least 10 characters long
locationMin: Location must be at least 2 characters long
passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
sign-in-description: Sign in to continue to your Shark account.
minimum-code-is-6-characters: Code must be at least 6 characters long
password-must-be-at-least-8-characters-l: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password-must-contain-at-least-one-upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password-must-contain-at-least-one-lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password-must-contain-at-least-one-numbe: Password must contain at least one number
password-must-contain-at-least-one-speci: Password must contain at least one special character (@, $, !, %, *, ?, &)
